attributes.action: Stop the petition to have a 2nd EU referendum,overturn the vote to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details: All the votes where in and counted and the out come was to leave the EU this should not be overturned just because the people that voted to stay in has setup a petition to go against the out come the UK made a choice to leave by the numbers.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that if the petition set out to undermine and overturn the recent EU referendum vote to leave.
